Use natural light: I would set my bedroom to face the sunrise, so that the rising sun would wake me up naturally.
Use sound: I would place a sound machine or a speaker in my room that would play a soothing or uplifting music to wake me up.
Use scent: I would place a diffuser or a candle in my room that would emit a relaxing or energizing scent to wake me up.
Use temperature: I would place a smart thermostat in my room that would gradually raise the temperature to wake me up.
Use vibration: I would place a vibration pad under my bed that would shake me awake when it's time to get up.
